Farma Dorsch Go Organic Mousse

Brand: Farma Dorsch

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: AQUA, ACTINIDIA CHINENSIS (KIWI) FRUIT WATER, GLYCERIN, INULIN, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, ANTHEMIS NOBILIS (CAMOMILA) FLOWER EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT, ZINGIBER OFFICINALE ROOT EXTRACT, EUTERPE OLERACEA FRUIT EXTRACT, ARGININE, CITRIC A
, ARGININE, CITRIC ACID, POLYGLYCERYL-4 LAURATE/SEBACATE, POLYGLYCERYL-6 CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, SODIUM ANISATE, SODIUM LEVULINATE, CAPRYLYL/ CAPRYL GLUCOSIDE
